title.value: Повышение эффективности картофелепродуктового подкомплекса на основе кооперации и интеграции
Improving of the efficiency of potato-productive subcomplex based on cooperation and integration

organization.name: Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex

person.name: Sinelnikov, V.M., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex

organization.name: National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex

abstract.value: The book presents the propositions, aimed on increase of efficiency of potato-producing subcomplex, and based upon principles of cooperation and integration. The most important problems of the formation and development of cooperative and integrative structures in agricultural sector are outlined; the rationale for creating effective cooperative and integrative structures in potato-producing subcomplex is given. The factors and conditions for the efficient production of potato and its processing are analyzed; assessment of the state of development of cooperation and integration in potato-producing subseries is made; proposals of improving the efficiency of operation of potato-producing subcomplex on the basis of cooperation and integration are given. Theoretical basis for the formation of cooperative and integrative structures in agriculture is substantiated; objective necessity for the creation of cooperative and integrative structures in potato-producing subcomplex is described. The most important features of organization and management of agro-holding type formations along with key factors and conditions of the efficient potato production are analyzed. A model of cooperative and integrative structures in potato-producing subcomplex is developed.
